english.segment1: we don't have to say a word. sometimes its better when we don't. apologizes aren't always heard
english.segment2: sit beside me through the storm. the clouds above will take another form
english.segment3: Chorus. it would be so easy for you to walk away. all that I can tell you is. I want you to stay
english.segment4: forget that man I was before. my eyes are open to the sky. my back lay flat against another shore
english.segment5: I can't erase mistakes I've made. and I can't stand to have them bring you pain
english.segment7: the clouds are empty. they roll away. the sky is silent. I am amazed. that you are still sitting here. when you could have left me. to drift away
